entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Rain showers beginning early this afternoon then changing to flurries this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
